word_mean: 平衡：正反作用力的相互抵销，即处于平衡或均衡状态

sentence.Network_en: He had recovered his equilibrium and even his good humour, somehow.
sentence.Network_cn: 不知怎的，他已经恢复了平静，连心情也变好了。

sentence.Network_en: Stocks seesawed ever lower until prices found some new level of equilibrium.
sentence.Network_cn: 股票在震荡中进一步下跌，直到股价达到某个新的平衡点。

sentence.Network_en: Any disturbance to the body's state of equilibrium can produce stress.
sentence.Network_cn: 对身体平衡状态的任何干扰都可能产生压力。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... equanimity n 镇静，沉着 equilibrium n 平衡，均势 equity n 公平，公正.
...给曲线和需求曲线，在一定的数量和价格下，两者会达到均衡（Equilibrium）。
高清电影硬盘拷贝目录070915 ... 人生遥控器 Click 撕裂的末日 Equilibrium 断背山. Brokeback Mountain.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... equanimity n 镇静，沉着 equilibrium n 平衡，均势 equity n 公平，公正.

list.abs: 纳什均衡（Nash equilibrium）(Nash Equilibrium)：在一策略组合中，所有的参与者面临这样一种情况，当其他人不改变策略时，他此时的策略是最好的。 …
经济学英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... equilibrium condition 均衡条件 equilibrium price 均衡价格 equilibrium quantity 均衡产量.
图文平衡常数(equilibrium constant)为1893年波斯坦(M. Bodenstein, 1871 ~ 1942)经由实验结果归纳所发现的概念,下表为波斯坦在448℃下 H2 + I2 photo1.jpg 2HI.
物理专业词汇英语翻译(A-D) ... dynamic electricity 动电 dynamic equilibrium 动态平衡 dynamic error 动态误差.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'well-balanced state of mind'): from Latin aequilibrium, from aequi- 'equal'+ libra 'balance'

entry.def: Equilibrium is a balance between several different influences or aspects of a situation.

example.ex: Stocks seesawed ever lower until prices found some new level of equilibrium...
example.tran: 股票在震荡中进一步下跌，直到股价达到某个新的平衡点。

example.ex: For the economy to be in equilibrium, income must equal expenditure.
example.tran: 经济要达到平衡，收支必须均衡。

entry.def: Someone's equilibrium is their normal calm state of mind.

example.ex: I paused in the hall to take three deep breaths to restore my equilibrium...
example.tran: 我在大厅里停了一下，深吸了三口气以恢复平静。

example.ex: He had recovered his equilibrium and even his good humour, somehow.
example.tran: 不知怎的，他已经恢复了平静，连心情也变好了。

means.word_mean: 1. a chemical reaction and its reverse proceed at equal rates
2. a stable situation in which forces cancel one another
4. a sensory system located in structures of the inner ear that registers the orientation of the head

auth_sentence.content: The political system will have more of an equilibrium.
auth_sentence.res_content: The political system will have more of an equilibrium.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The political system will have more of an equilibrium.

auth_sentence.content: He says the world is in an imperfect equilibrium.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says the world is in an imperfect equilibrium.

auth_sentence.content: Equilibrium shares the same earnestness as DJ Spooky's Optometry.
auth_sentence.res_content: Equilibrium shares the same earnestness as DJ Spooky's Optometry.

stems_affixes.word_buile: equi相等,平均+val价值+ent……的→力量相等
equi相等,平均+voc出声,声音+al……的→两种声音平等→意义含糊的
equi相等,平均+libr自由+ium→在自由下平等→平衡
equi相等,平均+val价值+ent……的→力量相等
in不+equity[n.公平,公正]→n.邪恶,不公正

sentences.en: Change in the world around us disturbs our inner equilibrium.
sentences.cn: 我们周围世界的变化扰乱了我们内心的平静。
